content: X-CC 45 Ceiling clips Ceiling clip without premounted nail ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features 45 degree angled clip without fastener Ceiling clip with optional wire only Applications Suspending ceilings from concrete Suspending ceilings from concrete over metal deck Ceiling application on steel Can be used for supporting splay bracing applications in seismic areas ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Acoustic ceiling Base materials: Concrete, Light-weight concrete, Concrete over metal deck, Structural steel Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated Technical Data | Application | Acoustic ceiling | Base materials | Concrete, Concrete over metal deck | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 343760 - Ceiling clip X-CC45 - Package Size 100 pc
